original_text: “Immediately after the tribulation of those days the sun will be darkened, and the moon will not give its light, and the stars will fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens will be shaken.
korean_text: 그 날 환난 후에 즉시 해가 어두워지며 달이 빛을 내지 아니하며 별들이 하늘에서 떨어지며 하늘의 권능들이 흔들리리라

sentences.original_text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days
and the moon will not give its light
sentences.korean_translation: 달은 그 빛을 내지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and the stars will fall from heaven
and the powers of the heavens will be shaken
